svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.0.16"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="TJrqsYJP7GB2wDW6Y62B"> <mxGraphModel dx="2035" dy="768" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="800" pageHeight="800" math="1" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-6" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-1" value="<span style="">/datasets/HST/group##/</span>....fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=0" parent="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="30" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-3" value="<span style="">/datasets/HST/group##/</span>....fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=0" parent="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="60" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-4" value="<span style="">/datasets/HST/group##/</span>....fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=0" parent="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="90" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-5" value="<span style="">/datasets/HST/group##/</span>....fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=0" parent="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="120" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-6" value="<span style="">/datasets/HST/group##/</span>....fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=0" parent="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="150" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-7" value="<span style="">/datasets/HST/group##/</span>....fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=0" parent="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="180" width="170" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-40" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-9" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-12" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-9" value=""coadded".fits" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="3.75" y="410" width="190" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-31" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-12" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-13" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-12" value="project polar data onto full hemisphere, generate image" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="255" y="270" width="190" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-30" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-13" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-18" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-13" value="crop image to be bounded by the hemisphere" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="263.75" y="350" width="172.5" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-23" style="edgeStyle=entityRelationEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-15" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-17" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-15" value="LRANGE<div><font style="font-size: 10px;">(luminosity range)</font></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="545" y="530" width="140" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-29" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-17" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-22" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-17" value="generate a binary mask:&nbsp;<div><font style="font-size: 10px;"><i>if in LRANGE:1, else:0</i></font><div><br></div><div><font face="Courier New">(cv2.inRange)</font></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="265" y="490" width="170" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-27" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-18" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-17" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-18" value="Normalize image array" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="276.25" y="420" width="147.5" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-24" style="edgeStyle=entityRelationEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-19" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-22" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-19" value="MORPHS<div><font style="font-size: 10px;">(morphology operations</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 10px;">&nbsp;to&nbsp;</font><span style="font-size: 10px; background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">apply to mask)</span></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="8.75" y="505" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-25" style="edgeStyle=entityRelationEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-21" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-22" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-21" value="KSIZE<div><font style="font-size: 10px;">(x&amp;y length of matrix</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 10px;">&nbsp;to use with morphs)</font></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="8.75" y="575" width="180" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-33" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-22" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-22" value="apply MORPHS<div>&nbsp;to mask, using kernel of KSIZE</div><div><font face="Courier New">(cv2.morphologyEx)</font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="262.5" y="600" width="175" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-37" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-32" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-34" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-32" value="Find coordinates for all ALL valid contours<div><br></div><div><font face="Courier New">(cv2.findContours)</font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="257.5" y="690" width="185" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-39" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-34" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-38" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-34" value="Identify a contour that encloses an area containing the ID points<div><br></div><div><font face="Courier New">(cv2.pointPolygonTest)</font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="262.5" y="790" width="177.5" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-36" style="edgeStyle=entityRelationEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-35" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-34" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="480" y="750" /> <mxPoint x="540" y="790" /> <mxPoint x="480" y="800" /> <mxPoint x="480" y="820" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-35" value="Identifiying point(s)<div><i><font style="font-size: 10px;">[(x,y) pair(s) in image coordinates]</font></i></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="535" y="590" width="150" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-9" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 1;curved=1;endArrow=none;startFill=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-38" target="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-8" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-38" value="Transform contour coordinates from (x,y) "image" coordinates to colatitude and longitude coordinates" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="256" y="894" width="190" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-44" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;edgeStyle=entityRelationEdgeStyle;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-41" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="140" y="760" /> <mxPoint x="190" y="750" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-41" value="Retrieval Method&nbsp;<div><font style="font-size: 10px;"><i>(various methods to choose which contours to ignore, eg return only externals)</i></font></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="8.75" y="695" width="180" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-43" style="edgeStyle=entityRelationEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-42" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="80" y="710" /> <mxPoint x="90" y="760" /> <mxPoint x="140" y="700" /> <mxPoint x="150" y="730" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-42" value="&nbsp;Approximation Method&nbsp;<div><i><font style="font-size: 10px;">(various methods to reduce</font></i></div><div><i><font style="font-size: 10px;">&nbsp;</font></i><i style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><font style="font-size: 10px;">number of points in contours)</font></i></div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="8.75" y="635" width="180" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=none;endFill=0;startFill=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 2;curved=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-46" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-46" value="<font style="font-size: 8px;">Algorithm from&nbsp;<a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20231213161741/https://www.nevis.columbia.edu/~vgenty/public/suzuki_et_al.pdf"><i>Suzuki et al.</i></a>,<a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20231213161741/https://www.nevis.columbia.edu/~vgenty/public/suzuki_et_al.pdf"><i>1985, "Topological Structural Analysis of Digitized Binary Images By Border Following"</i></a></font>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;labelBorderColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="63.75" y="790" width="130" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-2" value="Process Parameters" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-21.25" y="465" width="230" height="310" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=none;startFill=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 1;curved=1;" parent="1" source="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-3" target="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-3" value="Region Specific Parameters" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="515" y="490" width="185" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-5" target="EbWG2Iag0asux-bbq2b8-9" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-5" value="coadd all observations, applying gaussian blur" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="12.37" y="330" width="171.25" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-8" value="<p style="margin-top: 0px;">Image is square. w=h=Diameter of projection</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">coordinate system has (0,0) at top left.&nbsp;</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">pole position P0 = (w/2,w/2)</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">given a coordinate P =(x,y):</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">relative to pole, Prel = (x-w/2,y-w/2)</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">Hence colat = |Prel|/w *Rlim (Rlim being the maximum colatitude in the image)</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">lon = arctan(Prel_y/Prel_x) +90</p><p style="margin-top: 0px;">(+90 needed since 0deg at -y axis not +x axis.)</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="510" y="685" width="220" height="275" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="WkBhjFnNOGdC4W0s6mBg-10" value=""Pathfinder" app allows us to get these" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="430" width="155" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 12px; margin-left: 25px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: /datasets/HST/group##

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 35px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: /datasets/HST/group##/....fits

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 35px;

div.p: Image is square. w=h=Diameter of projection
coordinate system has (0,0) at top left.Â
Hence colat = |Prel|/w *Rlim (Rlim being the maximum colatitude in the image)
(+90 needed since 0deg at -y axis not +x axis.)

switch.text: Image is square. w=h=Diameter of pro...

div.div: "Pathfinder" app allows us to get these

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
